head.title: What now?
head.description: I helped organize WordCamp Stockholm 2016 at Internetdagarna. Lead the development of postcss.org and trying to actively update it. I alsoâ€¦

body:
I helped organize WordCamp Stockholm 2016 at Internetdagarna.

Lead the development of postcss.org and trying to actively update it. I also helped with the brand.

I developed WordPress Sveriges new theme in WordPress together with Mattias Tengblad - https://github.com/wpsvse/wpsvse/.

I have been doing lead front-end work on various projects for happiness.se - Portfolio.

Sometimes I give talks...

  • http://slides.com/marcustisater/deck-1-2#/
  • http://marcustisater.github.io/postcss-presentation/#/

Most of the stuff I have done is on Gitub... and it's opensource.
